Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI gives more detailed responses, whereas teacher / TA responses often are limited due to having to provide feedback to many students.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback made me feel more content in my work due to having more depth.
